name: abolition
trans: n. 废除；废止

sentences.english: The abolition of slavery in Brazil and the Caribbean closely followed the pattern of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 巴西和加勒比海地区对奴隶制的废除很大程度上遵循了美国的模式。

detailed_translations.english: when a law or a system is officially ended

name: emancipator
trans: n. 释放者；解放者

sentences.english: After his son's death, Lincoln decided that one of his purposes was to be an emancipator -- to begin the process of freeing the slaves. A few months later, he wrote the Emancipation Proclamation.
sentences.chinese: 在他儿子去逝后，林肯确定他的一个目标就是要成为一名解放者----推动奴隶自由的进程，几个月后，他起草了《解放宣言》。

name: equality
trans: n. 平等；相等；[数] 等式

sentences.english: ...equality of the sexes.
sentences.chinese: …性别平等。

detailed_translations.chinese: 等同； 平等； 相等
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people have the same rights, advantages etc

name: orator
trans: n. 演说者；演讲者；雄辩家；原告

sentences.english: He was a natural politician, a gifted orator who knew how to work a crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是位天生的政治家，是位有天赋且知道如何凝集民众的演说家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演说者；演讲者；雄辩家；原告
detailed_translations.english: someone who is good at making speeches and persuading people

name: secede
trans: vi. 脱离；退出 vt. 从…中脱离；割让

sentences.english: Singapore seceded from the Federation of Malaysia and became an independent sovereign state.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡脱离马来西亚联邦成为一个独立的主权国家。

detailed_translations.english: if a country or state secedes from another country, it officially stops being part of it and becomes independent

name: accomplice
trans: n. 同谋者，[法] 共犯

sentences.english: Witnesses said the gunman immediately ran to a motorcycle being ridden by an accomplice.
sentences.chinese: 证人们说该枪手立即向由一名同犯驾驶的摩托车跑去。

detailed_translations.english: a person who helps someone such as a criminal to do something wrong

name: destitute
trans: adj. 穷困的；无的；缺乏的 n. 赤贫者 vt. 使穷困；夺去

sentences.english: The floods left many people destitute .
sentences.chinese: 这场洪水使许多人变得一无所有。

detailed_translations.english: having no money, no food, no home etc

name: flabbergasted
trans: adj. 目瞪口呆的，大吃一惊的 v. 使……大吃一惊（flabbergast 的过去式和过去分词）

name: prosperous
trans: adj. 繁荣的；兴旺的

sentences.english: a prosperous landowner
sentences.chinese: 富裕的土地拥有者

detailed_translations.english: rich and successful

name: spurious
trans: adj. 假的；伪造的；欺骗的

sentences.english: spurious sympathy
sentences.chinese: 假同情

detailed_translations.english: insincere

name: unscrupulous
trans: adj. 肆无忌惮的；寡廉鲜耻的；不讲道德的

sentences.english: unscrupulous employers
sentences.chinese: 无耻的雇主

detailed_translations.chinese: 肆无忌惮的；寡廉鲜耻的；不讲道德的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in an unfair or dishonest way

name: annihilation
trans: n. 毁灭；溃败；（物理）湮灭，湮没

sentences.english: That is because Hamas is a terrorist organisation. Its founding charter claims the Holy Land exclusively for Islam and calls for the complete annihilation of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为哈马斯是一个恐怖组织，它的成立宪章中宣称加沙是伊斯兰独一无二的圣地，号召完全消灭以色列。

name: brainwash
trans: v. 对……洗脑，以宣传说服 n. 洗脑

sentences.english: They brainwash people into giving up all their money.
sentences.chinese: 他们给人们洗脑,使他们放弃他们所有的钱。

detailed_translations.english: If you brainwash someone, you force them to believe something by continually telling them that it is true, and preventing them from thinking about it properly

name: collaborate
trans: vi. 合作；勾结，通敌

sentences.english: Much later he collaborated with his son Michael on the English translation of a text on food production.
sentences.chinese: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

detailed_translations.english: to work together with a person or group in order to achieve something, especially in science or art

name: colonization
trans: n. 殖民；殖民地化

sentences.english: What is the process of colonization?
sentences.chinese: 殖民地化的过程又是怎样？

sentences.english: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.chinese: 他们了解殖民、革命还有移民。

sentences.english: We also substituted “settlement” for “colonization” in the title of the book.
sentences.chinese: 本书标题中原先使用的“殖民”一词，也用“移民”代替。

name: invasion
trans: n. 入侵，侵略；侵袭；侵犯

sentences.english: the invasion of Normandy
sentences.chinese: 对诺曼底的入侵

detailed_translations.english: when the army of one country enters another country by force, in order to take control of it

name: submit
trans: vt. 使服从；主张；呈递；提交 vi. 服从，顺从

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从， 听从； 忍受； 甘心
detailed_translations.english: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从，听从，服从；呈送，提交；主张，建议
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: breakthrough
trans: n. 突破；突破性进展

sentences.english: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.chinese: 该公司看上去稳将在中国实现一次重大突破。

detailed_translations.english: an important new discovery in something you are studying, especially one made after trying for a long time

name: consumption
trans: n. 消费；消耗；肺痨

sentences.english: Vigorous exercise increases oxygen consumption.
sentences.chinese: 剧烈运动增加氧的消耗。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of energy, oil, electricity etc that is used

name: habitable
trans: adj. 可居住的；适于居住的

sentences.english: It would cost a fortune to make the place habitable.
sentences.chinese: 要想让这个地方可以住人得花一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: good enough for people to live in

name: perspective
trans: n. 观点；远景；透视图 adj. 透视的

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: technology
trans: n. 技术；工艺；术语

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

name: transition
trans: n. 过渡；转变；[分子生物] 转换；变调

sentences.english: Making the transition from youth to adulthood can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 从青少年过渡到成年有时是一个非常痛苦的过程。

sentences.english: a society that is in transition
sentences.chinese: 一个正在转型的社会

sentences.english: the period of transition to full democracy
sentences.chinese: 向全面民主的过渡时期

detailed_translations.english: when something changes from one form or state to another

name: collaborator
trans: n. [劳经] 合作者；勾结者；通敌者

sentences.english: collaborators on a biography of Dickens
sentences.chinese: 狄更斯传记的合著者

detailed_translations.english: someone who works with other people or groups in order to achieve something, especially in science or art

name: compatible
trans: adj. 兼容的；能共处的；可并立的

sentences.english: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

detailed_translations.english: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies

name: sacrifice
trans: n. 牺牲；祭品；供奉 vt. 牺牲；献祭；亏本出售 vi. 献祭；奉献

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.chinese: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.english: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.english: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important
to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important

name: epiphyte
trans: n. 附生植物；体表寄生菌

name: foliage
trans: n. 植物；叶子（总称）

sentences.english: dark green foliage
sentences.chinese: 墨绿色的叶子

detailed_translations.english: the leaves of a plant

name: peccary
trans: n. 西貒，矛牙野猪

name: species
trans: n. [生物] 物种；种类 adj. 物种上的

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: substrate
trans: n. 基质；基片；底层（等于substratum）；酶作用物

sentences.english: As chemical precursors stream onto the surface of a rolling metal or plastic substrate, they react with one another to form a network of nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 各化学母质流向滚动中的金属或塑料基片的表面，他们互相作用，形成一层纳米级微粒网状结构。

sentences.english: Fundamentally, these paradigms can be (and are) built on top of a substrate of threads and locks, but they create higher level abstractions that push much of that complexity down.
sentences.chinese: 从根本上讲，这些范例可以（且是）构建于线程和锁的基底之上，但是它们创建降低复杂度的更高的抽象级别。

sentences.english: This means that a file system would serve as a reasonable substrate for a synchronization database.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着文件系统作为同步数据库的底层支持是合情合理的。

detailed_translations.english: the substance upon which an enzyme acts

name: tributary
trans: n. （大河或湖泊的）支流；进贡国，附属国 adj. 纳贡的；促进的

sentences.english: ...the Napo river, a tributary of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: ...纳波河，亚马孙河的一条支流。

detailed_translations.english: a stream or river that flows into a larger river

name: cerebrum
trans: n. [解剖] 大脑

name: decipher
trans: v. 破译，译解；辨认，解释，理解 n. 密电（或密信的）译文

sentences.english: She studied the envelope, trying to decipher the handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 她仔细地看信封，试图辨认上面的字迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 解释（过去式deciphered，过去分词deciphered，现在分词deciphering，第三人称单数deciphers，名词decipherer，形容词decipherable）；译解
detailed_translations.english: to find the meaning of something that is difficult to read or understand

name: hemisphere
trans: n. 半球

sentences.english: the Northern hemisphere
sentences.chinese: 北半球

detailed_translations.english: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator

name: lobe
trans: n. （脑、肺等的）叶；裂片；耳垂；波瓣 n. (Lobe)人名；(西)洛韦；(德、喀)洛贝

sentences.english: ...damage to the temporal lobe of the brain.
sentences.chinese: ...对大脑颞叶的损伤。

detailed_translations.english: the soft piece of flesh at the bottom of your ear

name: neuron
trans: n. [解剖] 神经元，神经单位

sentences.english: A neuron has only one axon.
sentences.chinese: 一个神经元只有一个轴突。

sentences.english: Between any neurons, between the axon of one neuron and the dendrite of another, there's a tiny gap.
sentences.chinese: 在神经元之间，在一个神经元的轴突，和另一个神经元的树突之间，有一个细小的缝隙。

sentences.english: But they don't know exactly what goes into that neuron to store the memory, or how to dissolve that synaptic connection if you want to forget something.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们不十分准确的了解存储记忆的时候是什么被带进了神经元，如果你想要忘记某些事情，有如何让连接的触突解散。

detailed_translations.english: a type of cell that makes up the nervous system and sends messages to other parts of the body or the brain

name: photosynthesis
trans: n. 光合作用

sentences.english: It has at least one gene necessary for photosynthesis—so far it’s the only animal known with this ability.
sentences.chinese: 它有至少一个基因是光合作用所必需的——到目前为止这是唯一被发现具有此项能力的动物。

sentences.english: The belt of vegetation that crosses Africa below the Sahara is very dark because most of the sunlight is absorbed by plants for photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 在撒哈拉沙漠下方，横贯非洲中部的植被带颜色非常深，因为植物由于光合作用吸收了大多数太阳光。

sentences.english: As the ocean warms, it becomes more stratified, with the warmer water remaining at the top where the organisms need to be in order to do photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 但是随着海水变暖，它的层次会更加分明，温度更高的海水会停留在表面，而这里正是生物体进行光合作用必需的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the production by a green plant of special substances like sugar that it uses as food, caused by the action of sunlight on  chlorophyll (= the green substance in leaves )

name: phytoplankton
trans: n. [植] 浮游植物（群落）

name: city-state
trans: n. 城邦

name: civilization
trans: n. 文明；文化

sentences.english: modern American civilization
sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的古代文明

detailed_translations.english: a society that is well organized and developed, used especially about a particular society in a particular place or at a particular time

name: cuneiform
trans: adj. 楔形文字的；楔形的；楔状骨的 n. 楔形文字；楔状骨

sentences.english: The chicken scratch is cuneiform.
sentences.chinese: 鸡爪印是楔形文字。

sentences.english: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.chinese: 她用楔形文字写下了献给神祇的颂歌。

sentences.english: A 1913 statute, still on the books, sought to thwart propaganda by forbidding the hiring of "publicity experts, " a ban that has as much to do with modern communication as cuneiform tablets.
sentences.chinese: 一项1913年颁布、至今有效的法律旨在通过禁止雇用“公关专家”来阻止宣传，这道禁令涵盖的是从现代通讯到楔形文字泥板的一切。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔古代美索不达米亚人使用的〕楔形文字的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the writing used by the people of ancient Mesopotamia

name: nomadic
trans: adj. 游牧的；流浪的；游动的

sentences.english: nomadic herdsmen
sentences.chinese: 游牧民

detailed_translations.english: nomadic people are nomads

name: phonologic
trans: adj. 音韵学的；语音体系的

name: pictograph
trans: n. [语] 象形文字；古代石壁画；统计图表

sentences.english: ...a pictogram of a pine tree.
sentences.chinese: …一幅代表一棵松树的象形图画。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 象形文字；古代石壁画；统计图表
detailed_translations.english: A pictogram is a simple drawing that represents something. Pictograms were used as the earliest form of writing.

name: annex
trans: v. 附加；获得；并吞；占为己有（非正式） n. 附加物；附属建筑物；（文件）附录 n. (Annex) （美、法、尼、瑞、加）艾尼克斯（人名）

sentences.english: Any annex is the integral part of this contract.
sentences.chinese: 本合同一切附件均为本合同的有效组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: to take control of a country or area next to your own, especially by using force

name: Holocaust
trans: n. 大屠杀；毁灭

name: Jew
trans: n. 犹太人；犹太教徒；守财奴 vt. 杀价；欺骗

sentences.english: The disciple was a Jew . "What good work shall I do to be acceptable to God "?
sentences.chinese: 一个犹太人门徒问：“我应该做什么样工作才能让上帝接受?”（合上帝之意?。

sentences.english: If a Christian wrong a Jew, what should his sufferance be by Christian example? Why, revenge.
sentences.chinese: 要是一个犹太人欺侮了一个基督徒，那基督徒怎样表现他的谦逊？报仇。 妹。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose religion is Judaism, or who is a member of a group whose traditional religion is Judaism

name: memoir
trans: n. 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录

sentences.english: Lady Thatcher had just published her memoirs.
sentences.chinese: 撒切尔夫人刚刚出版了她的回忆录。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录
detailed_translations.english: a book by someone important and famous in which they write about their life and experiences

name: Nazi
trans: n. (Nazi) 纳粹党人；极端种族主义者；专横的人，凶残的人 adj. (Nazi) 纳粹党的，纳粹主义的 n. (Nazi) （伊、美、巴）娜济（人名）

sentences.english: What percentage of the audiences is Nazi?
sentences.chinese: 观众中纳粹的百分率是多少？

sentences.english: Sometimes he whipped his prey, just as he had been whipped in the Nazi labor camp from which he escaped in 1944 before he could be sent to the gas chambers.
sentences.chinese: 有时，他也会用鞭子抽打那些纳粹分子，就像他在纳粹集中营遭受过的折磨那样。1944年他逃出了集中营，否则，有可能就会被送进毒气室杀害。

sentences.english: "By translation into another language, the Nazi slogan, which is characterized not just by its meaning but also by the German language, is fundamentally transformed, " it said.
sentences.chinese: 法院称，“这条纳粹标语不仅是以其含义而且是以德文为特征的，通过翻译变成另一种语言，它就有了根本性的改变。”

sentences.english: ...the rise of the Nazi Party.
sentences.chinese: …纳粹党的崛起。

detailed_translations.english: a member of the National Socialist Party of Adolf Hitler which controlled Germany from 1933 to 1945
You use Nazi to say that something relates to the Nazis

name: occupation
trans: n. 职业；占有；消遣；占有期

sentences.english: Please state your name, address and occupation.
sentences.chinese: 请写明你的姓名、地址和职业。

sentences.english: professional and managerial occupations
sentences.chinese: 专业及管理工作

sentences.english: manual occupations
sentences.chinese: 体力工作

sentences.english: the German occupation of France
sentences.chinese: 德军对法国的占领

detailed_translations.english: a job or profession

name: agriculture
trans: n. 农业；农耕；农业生产；农艺，农学

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农业；农耕；农业生产；农艺，农学
detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

name: alter
trans: vt. 改变，更改 vi. 改变；修改 n. (Alter) （美、德）阿尔特（人名）

sentences.english: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.chinese: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.english: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.chinese: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.english: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

detailed_translations.english: to change, or to make someone or something change

name: assess
trans: vt. 评定；估价；对…征税

sentences.english: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement.
sentences.chinese: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对估价； 评价， 评论
detailed_translations.english: to make a judgment about a person or situation after thinking carefully about it

name: consumer

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: gladiator
trans: n. 斗剑者；古罗马公开表演的格斗者；争论者

sentences.english: This is an arena for gladiators only, for the Titans of the track.
sentences.chinese: 这是个仅为勇士而且是仅为此行里的大力士勇士所设的竞技场。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角斗士， 与野兽搏斗者
detailed_translations.english: a soldier who fought against other men or wild animals as an entertainment in ancient Rome

name: hypogeum
trans: n. （古代的）地下墓室、地窖

name: ingenuity
trans: n. 心灵手巧，独创性，足智多谋；精巧的装置

sentences.english: It’s limited only by your ingenuity!
sentences.chinese: 被束缚的仅仅是你的独创性！

sentences.english: Sitting with my IV drip, I like to think about all the human labour and ingenuity that come together in this medical moment.
sentences.chinese: 坐在那里进行着静脉点滴，我想到了所有的人类劳动和独创性在这一时刻汇聚到了一起。

sentences.english: And as the president said last week, no one should bet against the American worker, American business and American ingenuity.
sentences.chinese: 此外，正如总统上周所言，任何人都不应该小看美国的工人、美国的企业和美国的独创性。

name: renovation
trans: n. 革新；修理；恢复活力

sentences.english: It often results in lower renovation, cleaning and maintenance costs, too.
sentences.chinese: 它通常还导致较低的翻新、清洁和保养维修费用。

sentences.english: For novice friends, we do not know how much the specific renovation costs?
sentences.chinese: 对于新手朋友来说，大家都不了解具体装修费用是多少？

name: spectator
trans: n. 观众；旁观者

sentences.english: The match attracted over 40,000 spectators.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛吸引了四万多名观众。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is watching an event or game

name: velarium
trans: n. 天幕；露天剧场的遮日篷；拟缘膜

name: convention
trans: n. 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

name: diversity
trans: n. 多样性；差异

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

name: merchandise
trans: n. 商品；货物 vt. 买卖；推销 vi. 经商

sentences.english: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.english: They inspected the merchandise carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他们仔细地检查了商品。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are being sold
to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising

name: panel
trans: n. 仪表板；嵌板；座谈小组，全体陪审员 vt. 嵌镶板 n. (Panel) 帕内尔（人名）

sentences.english: A panel of experts has looked at the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 一组专家审核了那项提议。

sentences.english: There will be at least three senior doctors on the panel.
sentences.chinese: 专家小组中至少有三名资深医生。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people with skills or specialist knowledge who have been chosen to give advice or opinions on a particular subject

name: venue
trans: n. 聚会地点；举行场所；犯罪地点；发生地点；（英格兰律）审判地（指郡或区）

sentences.english: The first thing to do is book a venue.
sentences.chinese: 首先要做的是预订一个会场。

sentences.english: The band will play (= perform at ) as many venues as possible.
sentences.chinese: 那支乐队将在尽可能多的地方演出。

detailed_translations.english: a place where an organized meeting, concert etc takes place

name: Allies
trans: n. （第二次世界大战时的）同盟国；（第一次世界大战时的）协约国

name: casualty
trans: n. 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室

sentences.english: We have had our first casualty. One runner has dropped out with cramp.
sentences.chinese: 我们有了第一位伤员，有一位队员因腿部痉挛退出了。

sentences.english: Any history of bombing must also be a history of civilian casualty, for bombing saves the lives of soldiers only at the expense of other lives.
sentences.chinese: 任何空袭的历史也必定是平民伤亡的历史，因为空袭救了士兵的性命只能以其他人的生命为代价。

sentences.english: The first item always on that was the overnight casualty report from Iraq and Afghanistan, and I would often come and see that had been circled by the president or that he would be reflecting on that.
sentences.chinese: 上面的第一条永远是,这一晚在伊拉克和阿富汗,士兵的伤亡报告，我来的时候会看到那条消息,被布什总统圈了出来,他看着报告会陷入沉思。

name: draft
trans: n. 汇票；草稿；选派；（尤指房间、烟囱、炉子等供暖系统中的）（小股）气流 vt. 起草；制定；征募 vi. 拟稿；绘样；作草图 adj. 初步画出或（写出）的；（设计、草图、提纲或版本）正在起草中的，草拟的；以草稿形式的；草图的

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

name: infantry
trans: n. 步兵；步兵团

sentences.english: an infantry regiment
sentences.chinese: 步兵团

detailed_translations.english: soldiers who fight on foot

name: paratrooper
trans: n. 伞兵

name: application
trans: n. 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用；（对事物、学习等）投入

sentences.english: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.english: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.english: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 月底之前必须递交申请。

sentences.english: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
sentences.chinese: 我已递交了调动申请。

sentences.english: He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.chinese: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.english: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.chinese: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.english: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.chinese: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of application , which we received yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 申请， 申请书； 施用， 涂抹； 应用， 实施； 实用性
detailed_translations.english: a formal, usually written, request for something such as a job, place at university, or permission to do something

name: hologram
trans: n. [激光] 全息图；全息摄影，全息照相

sentences.english: No one knows what it would mean for us if we really do live in a hologram, yet theorists have good reasons to believe that many aspects of the holographic principle are true.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们确实生活在一张全息图中，没人知道这对我们究竟意味着什么。 但理论学家有很好的理由相信全息原理的很多方面是真实的。

detailed_translations.chinese: [激光] 全息图；全息摄影，全息照相
detailed_translations.english: a kind of photograph made with a  laser  that looks as if it is not flat when you look at it from an angle

name: immersive
trans: adj. 拟真的；沉浸式的；沉浸感的；增加沉浸感的

sentences.english: “Right now, we’re just getting to the phase where people appreciate how an “immersive” digital environment can be as complex and rich as sensation, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “现在，我们要进入一个阶段，让人们能够领会到‘沉浸式’数字环境可以像感觉一样复杂而丰富，”他说

detailed_translations.english: providing information or stimulation for a number of senses, not only sight and sound

name: sensor
trans: n. 传感器

sentences.english: The latest Japanese vacuum cleaners contain sensors that detect the amount of dust and type of floor.
sentences.chinese: 日本最新款吸尘器装有传感器，能测出灰尘量和地板类型。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used for discovering the presence of light, heat, movement etc

name: simulate
trans: vt. 模仿；假装；冒充 adj. 模仿的；假装的

sentences.english: a machine that simulates conditions in space
sentences.chinese: 一台模拟太空环境的机器

sentences.english: Interviews can be simulated in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 可以在教室里模拟面试。

detailed_translations.english: to make or produce something that is not real but has the appearance or feeling of being real

name: engineer
trans: n. 工程师；工兵；火车司机 vt. 设计；策划；精明地处理 vi. 设计；建造

sentences.english: He trained as a civil engineer (= one who designs and builds roads, bridges etc ).
sentences.chinese: 他接受过土木工程师培训。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design or build roads, bridges, machines etc

trans: n. 功绩，壮举；技艺表演 adj. 合适的；灵巧的

sentences.chinese: 赛车是工程学的一项非凡业绩。

detailed_translations.english: something that is an impressive achievement, because it needs a lot of skill, strength etc to do

name: landmark
trans: n. [航]陆标；地标；界标；里程碑；纪念碑；地界标；划时代的事 adj. 有重大意义或影响的 n. （瑞典、挪）兰德马克（人名）

name: latticework
trans: n. 格子；格子细工

name: replica
trans: n. 复制品，仿制品；模型；摹本

sentences.english: replica guns
sentences.chinese: 仿真枪

detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something, especially a building, a gun, or a work of art

name: transmission
trans: n. 传动装置，[机] 变速器；传递；传送；播送

sentences.chinese: 全球数据传输

detailed_translations.english: the process of sending out electronic signals, messages etc, using radio, television, or other similar equipment

name: mogul

sentences.english: ...an international media mogul.
sentences.chinese: ...一位国际传媒大亨。

sentences.english: ...Hollywood film moguls.
sentences.chinese: ...好莱坞电影业的巨头。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨头， 泰斗， 大人物， 巨擘
detailed_translations.english: A mogul is an important, rich, and powerful businessman, especially one in the news, film, or television industry

name: spire
trans: n. [建] 尖顶；尖塔；螺旋 vi. 螺旋形上升 vt. 给…加塔尖 n. (Spire)人名；(德)施皮雷；(法)斯皮尔

sentences.english: ...a church spire poking above the trees.
sentences.chinese: …伸出树梢的教堂尖顶。

detailed_translations.english: a roof that rises steeply to a point on top of a tower, especially on a church

name: steel
trans: n. 钢铁；钢制品；坚固 vt. 钢化；使冷酷 adj. 钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的 n. (Steel)人名；(德)施特尔；(英)斯蒂尔

sentences.english: a steel bridge
sentences.chinese: 钢铁大桥

sentences.english: stainless steel(= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢小刀

detailed_translations.english: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon

name: unprecedented
trans: adj. 空前的；无前例的

sentences.english: Such a move is rare, but not unprecedented.
sentences.chinese: 这样的举动少见，但并非从来没有过。

detailed_translations.english: If something is unprecedented, it has never happened before

name: atrocious
trans: adj. 凶恶的，残暴的

sentences.english: The judge said he had committed atrocious crimes against women.
sentences.chinese: 该法官称他对妇女犯下了残暴的罪行。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone's behaviour or their actions as atrocious, you mean that it is unacceptable because it is extremely violent or cruel

name: Jewish
trans: adj. 犹太人的；犹太族的

sentences.english: the Jewish religion
sentences.chinese: 犹太教

sentences.english: My husband is Jewish.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫是犹太人。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Jews or Judaism

name: refugee
trans: n. 难民，避难者；流亡者，逃亡者

sentences.chinese: 难民正涌过边境。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["refugee camps"]}
sentences.chinese: 难民营

detailed_translations.chinese: 难民，避难者；流亡者，逃亡者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has been forced to leave their country, especially during a war, or for political or religious reasons

name: spirit
trans: n. 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒 vt. 鼓励；鼓舞；诱拐

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: cabinet
trans: n. 内阁；橱柜；展览艺术品的小陈列室 adj. 内阁的；私下的，秘密的

sentences.english: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.english: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.chinese: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

detailed_translations.english: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

name: executive
trans: adj. 经营管理的；有执行权的；高级的；供重要人物使用的 n. 主管；行政领导；（政府的）行政部门；执行委员会

sentences.english: a commission with executive powers
sentences.chinese: 有执行权的委员会

detailed_translations.english: relating to the job of managing a business or organization and making decisions
a group of people who are in charge of an organization and make the rules

name: federal
trans: adj. 联邦的；同盟的；联邦政府的； 联邦制的 adv. 联邦政府地 n. (Federal)人名；(英)费德勒尔

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

name: impeachment
trans: n. 弹劾；控告；怀疑；指摘

sentences.english: There are grounds for impeachment.
sentences.chinese: 有数个弹劾的理由。

detailed_translations.english: The impeachment of a senior official is the process of charging them with a crime that makes them unfit for office

name: pardon
trans: n. 原谅；赦免；宽恕 vt. 原谅；赦免；宽恕 n. (Pardon)人名；(德、法、捷)帕尔东

sentences.english: He craved the teacher's pardon.
sentences.chinese: 他恳求老师原谅他。

sentences.english: I earnestly pray for your pardon.
sentences.chinese: 我恳切地请求你原谅。

sentences.english: I hope you will pardon me for doing so.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你原谅我这样做。

detailed_translations.english: to forgive someone for behaving badly
used to say ‘sorry’ after you have made an impolite sound such as a  burp

name: veto
trans: n. 否决权 vt. 否决；禁止 vi. 否决；禁止

sentences.english: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.chinese: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

name: counterpart
trans: n. 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物

sentences.english: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.chinese: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物
detailed_translations.english: Someone's or something's counterpart is another person or thing that has a similar function or position in a different place

name: drone
trans: n. 雄蜂；嗡嗡的声音；懒惰者 n. 无人机（非正式） vi. 嗡嗡作声；混日子 vt. 低沉地说 n. n. (Drone)人名；(法)德罗纳

sentences.english: An airplane droned overhead.
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机在头顶上轰鸣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雄蜂；嗡嗡的声音；懒惰者
detailed_translations.english: a continuous low dull sound
to make a continuous low dull sound

name: miniaturization
trans: n. 小型化，微型化

name: transistor
trans: n. 晶体管（收音机）

sentences.english: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。

sentences.english: The transistor became the basis of a new invention called the "computer" which I suspect those of you reading this may be familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 晶体管后来成为了一项叫做“计算机”的新发明的基础，我想正在阅读本文的你对于这个应该比较熟悉吧。

sentences.english: When you got a transistor radio, you could walk around with it, and today you can put your whole record collection in your pocket.
sentences.chinese: 而当你使用晶体管收音机时，你可以带着它到处走动，时至今日你可以把你收集的唱片装进口袋里。

name: transmitter
trans: n. [电讯] 发射机，[通信] 发报机；传达人

sentences.english: ...a homemade radio transmitter.
sentences.chinese: …一台自制的无线电发射机。

detailed_translations.english: equipment that sends out radio or television signals

name: DNA
trans: abbr. 脱氧核糖核酸（deoxyribonucleic acid）；（美国）国防部核子局（Defense Nuclear Agency）

sentences.english: At the moment, the regulation on how much human DNA can be put into an animal is vague.
sentences.chinese: 目前，有关多少人类脱氧核糖核酸可以放入一只动物身上的规定，还很模糊。

name: gene
trans: n. [遗] 基因，遗传因子

sentences.english: human genes
sentences.chinese: 人类基因

sentences.english: the genes that regulate cell division
sentences.chinese: 控制细胞分裂的基因

detailed_translations.english: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents

name: genetics
trans: n. 遗传学

sentences.english: Genetics is also bringing about dramatic changes in our understanding of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学也正使我们对癌症的理解发生巨大的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the study of how the qualities of living things are passed on in their genes

name: hybridization
trans: n. 杂交；配种；[化学] 杂化；杂种培殖

name: inherited
trans: adj. 遗传的；继承权的；通过继承得到的 v. 继承；经遗传而得（inherit的过去分词）

name: address
trans: n. 地址；所在地；位置储存编码；演讲；称呼；致辞；谈吐；技巧 v. 写（收信人）姓名地址；演说；向……说话，致词；冠以（某种称呼）；设法解决；就位击（球）；提出

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

name: brevity
trans: n. 简洁，简短；短暂，短促

sentences.english: Letters published in the newspaper are edited for brevity and clarity.
sentences.chinese: 报上刊登的来信都要编辑得简洁明了。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of expressing something in very few words

name: concise
trans: adj. 简明的，简洁的

sentences.english: Your summary should be as clear and concise as possible.

sentences.english: ...their stepfather, Baron Michael Distemple.
sentences.chinese: …他们的继父迈克尔• 迪斯坦普尔男爵

sentences.english: drug barons
sentences.chinese: 大毒枭

trans: n. 宪章；执照；特许状；（法律或政策的）漏洞；（飞机、船等的）租用 v. 包租；发给特许执照 adj. 包租的 n. (Charter) （美、英）查特（人名）

sentences.english: ...the last charter plane carrying out foreign nationals.
sentences.chinese: …运出外国侨民的最后一班包机。

detailed_translations.english: A charter plane or boat is one which is rented for use by a particular person or group and which is not part of a regular service

detailed_translations.chinese: 宪章，共同纲领；特许状，许可证；包租

to pay a company for the use of their aircraft, boat etc

detailed_translations.english: a formal and very serious promise

sentences.chinese: “你是对的。”丽塔安抚他道。

sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

name: preservation

sentences.chinese: 维护该地区的和平

detailed_translations.english: when something is kept in its original state or in good condition

trans: 有雉堞的

trans: n. [军] 设防；[军] 防御工事；加强；配方

sentences.chinese: 公元前500年左右的一个古代防御工事遗址

detailed_translations.english: towers, walls etc built around a place in order to protect it or defend it

name: heritage
trans: n. 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权 n. (Heritage)人名；(英)赫里蒂奇

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage

detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

sentences.chinese: 您还可以控制对象的恢复。

name: spatial
trans: adj. 空间的；存在于空间的；受空间条件限制的

sentences.chinese: …南非黑人就业和人口的空间分布。

detailed_translations.chinese: 空间的；存在于空间的；受空间条件限制的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the position, size, shape etc of things

trans: n. 精英；精华；中坚分子

sentences.chinese: 统治阶层内部的争权夺利

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have a lot of power and influence because they have money, knowledge, or special skills

detailed_translations.english: a landlocked country, state etc is surrounded by other countries, states etc and has no coast

sentences.chinese: 这座城市已变成繁忙的大都市。

detailed_translations.english: a very large city that is the most important city in a country or area

trans: n. 仪式；惯例；礼制 adj. 仪式的；例行的；礼节性的

sentences.english: ancient pagan rituals
sentences.chinese: 古老的异教仪式

sentences.english: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
sentences.chinese: 我们生活中宗教和宗教仪式的重要性

sentences.english: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
sentences.chinese: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

detailed_translations.english: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion

trans: adj. 负担得起的

sentences.chinese: …多数人支付得起的房产的供应。

sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼电影公司回到他们最拿手的事情：制作长篇动画故事片。

sentences.english: The information given to the press was carefully censored by the Ministry of Defence.
sentences.chinese: 发布给报界的信息经过了国防部的仔细审查。

sentences.chinese: 废物回收利用的创新计划

sentences.chinese: 所有这些地震都发生在紫坪铺水库水位很低的时候。

name: resourcefulness
trans: n. 足智多谋

sentences.english: What stories can you relay that show your passion, initiative and resourcefulness?
sentences.chinese: 你可以讲述什么样的故事来展示你的激情，主动和足智多谋呢？

sentences.english: Additionally, with no belief in your capabilities and resourcefulness, you find it hard to take up new challenges or to explore new frontiers.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，由于你不相信你很有能力而且足智多谋，你就发现迎接新的挑战或者探索新的领域是多么困难。

sentences.english: However, Dr Haselhuhn argues that physical clues to dishonesty could survive if they were also linked to qualities seen as positive by women – such as charm or resourcefulness.
sentences.chinese: 然而，哈瑟尔罕争论道：如果这些生理特征对于女性来说是优点的话，比如说有魅力或者足智多谋，那么还是可能继续存在的。

sentences.chinese: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.english: We need an effective strategy to fight poverty .
sentences.chinese: 我们需要制定一个有效的对策来与贫困作斗争。

sentences.english: continued efforts to alleviate poverty and raise living standards
sentences.chinese: 缓解贫困和提高生活水平的不懈努力

sentences.english: scenes of abject poverty
sentences.chinese: 极度贫困的情景

sentences.english: the causes of urban poverty
sentences.chinese: 造成城市贫困的原因

detailed_translations.english: the situation or experience of being poor

trans: vt. 使受精；使肥沃

sentences.english: The faeces contain nitrogen which fertilizes the soil.
sentences.chinese: 排泄物含有肥沃土壤的氮。

detailed_translations.english: To fertilize land means to improve its quality in order to make plants grow well on it, by spreading solid animal waste or a chemical mixture on it

name: genetic

sentences.english: genetic defects
sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

name: hybrid
trans: n. 杂种，混血儿；混合物 adj. 混合的；杂种的

sentences.chinese: 具有混合风格的建筑

sentences.english: ...the hybrid corn seed.
sentences.chinese: …杂交玉米种子。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant produced from parents of different breeds or types
Hybrid is also an adjective

name: reproduce
trans: vt. 复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现 vi. 复制；繁殖

sentences.english: Klimt’s artwork is reproduced in this exquisite book.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的书里翻印了克里木特的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: to make a photograph or printed copy of something

name: assassinate
trans: vt. 暗杀；行刺

sentences.english: a plot to assassinate the President
sentences.chinese: 刺杀总统的阴谋

detailed_translations.english: to murder an important person

name: dictator
trans: n. 独裁者；命令者

sentences.english: the downfall of the hated dictator
sentences.chinese: 遭人痛恨的独裁者的垮台

detailed_translations.english: a ruler who has complete power over a country, especially one whose power has been gained by force

sentences.chinese: 她等待着消息，心里有一种不祥的预感。

sentences.english: The car won’t start. Do you think it’s an omen?
sentences.chinese: 汽车发动不起来。你觉得这是某种预兆吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sign of what will happen in the future

name: immunity
trans: n. 免疫力；豁免权；免除

sentences.english: To protect you against small pox or diphtheria, you are vaccinated with a small amount of the toxin, and then your body develops immunity against that toxin.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免你长小脓包或得白喉病，所以会给你的身体接种小量毒素，然后你的身体会针对这些毒素产生免疫力。

sentences.english: Very few people will have any immunity to this particular combination, which is what gives the concern that this will be a pandemic rather than just a normal seasonal flu outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 因为很少有人具备对这种特别的混合病毒的免疫力。 人们因此担心，这将不仅仅是正常的季节性流感疫情，而是一次传染病的大流行。

sentences.english: But a new study shows that people with true expertise in a subject have some immunity to the siren song of corporate sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 一项新的研究发现，在某一方面有真才实学的人们对广告赞助商的“糖衣炮弹”有一定的免疫力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being immune to a disease

name: paralyze
trans: vt. 使麻痹；使瘫痪

sentences.english: You can bet that would truly paralyze the flow of credit: Does anyone believe Washington can manage banks?
sentences.chinese: 你可以打赌，这会使流动的信贷真正限于瘫痪：真有人相信华盛顿可以经营银行吗？

sentences.english: I think we would all agree that it is well worth it, yet many of us still choose to let this innate fear paralyze us and settle into comfortable, secure positions despite being unhappy in them.
sentences.chinese: 我想每个人都认同这些东西是值得的，但是我们中许多人尽管对目前处境不甚满意，仍然选择麻痹于内在的恐惧，停滞于安逸，保险的职位。

name: polio
trans: n. 小儿麻痹症（等于poliomyelitis）；脊髓灰质炎

sentences.english: Gladys was crippled by polio at the age of 3.
sentences.chinese: 格拉迪丝3岁时因小儿麻痹症而瘸了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小儿麻痹症（等于poliomyelitis）；脊髓灰质炎
detailed_translations.english: a serious infectious disease of the nerves in the  spine  , that often results in someone being permanently unable to move particular muscles

name: vaccine
trans: n. 疫苗；牛痘苗 adj. 疫苗的；牛痘的

sentences.english: a polio vaccine
sentences.chinese: 小儿麻痹症疫苗

sentences.english: Doctors worried that there would not be enough vaccine for everyone who needed it.
sentences.chinese: 医生担心没有足够的疫苗给每个需要的人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance which contains a weak form of the bacteria or virus that causes a disease and is used to protect people from that disease

name: appeal
trans: n. 呼吁，恳求；上诉，申诉；吸引力，感染力，魅力；启发，打动 v. 呼吁，恳求；上诉，申诉，诉请裁决；对……有吸引力，有感染力；启发，劝说，打动

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

name: judicial
trans: adj. 公正的，明断的；法庭的；审判上的

sentences.english: ...an independent judicial system.
sentences.chinese: …一个独立的司法体系。

sentences.english: ...efforts to manipulate the judicial process.
sentences.chinese: …操纵审判程序的努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公正的，明断的；法庭的；审判上的
detailed_translations.english: Judicial means relating to the legal system and to judgments made in a court of law

name: lawsuit

sentences.english: The dispute culminated last week in a lawsuit against the government.
sentences.chinese: 这场针对政府诉讼案的争论在上星期达到了高潮。

trans: n. （尤指法庭的）裁定；统治，支配 adj. 统治的，支配的；主导的；流行的，普遍的

sentences.english: Goodwin tried to have the court ruling overturned.
sentences.chinese: 古德温试图推翻法院的裁决。

trans: n. 违反；妨碍，侵害；违背；强奸

sentences.chinese: 违反人权

detailed_translations.chinese: 违反；妨碍，侵害；违背；强奸

name: absolve
trans: vt. 免除；赦免；宣告…无罪

sentences.english: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
sentences.chinese: 警方昨天的调查为其开脱了在这件事故中所有的责任。

detailed_translations.english: to say publicly that someone is not guilty or responsible for something

trans: n. 受崇拜的人，英雄人物；半神半人；小神

trans: n. 狡猾；诡计；欺诈

sentences.english: With a little guile she might get what she wanted.
sentences.chinese: 她略施小计，也许就能得到自己想要的东西。

detailed_translations.english: the use of clever but dishonest methods to deceive someone

name: immortalize
trans: vt. 使不灭；使名垂千古，使不朽

name: penance
trans: n. 忏悔；苦修；苦差事 v. 使忏悔；使苦修

name: amend
trans: vt. 修改；改善，改进 vi. 改正，改善；改过自新 n. (Amend)人名；(德、英)阿门德

sentences.english: The law was amended to include women.
sentences.chinese: 该法律经修改把女性也包括在内。

sentences.english: The defendant later amended his evidence.
sentences.chinese: 被告后来修改了证词。

sentences.english: ‘Steve stole it – or rather borrowed it,’ he amended.
sentences.chinese: “史蒂夫偷的——应该说是借的。”他改口道。

detailed_translations.english: to correct or make small changes to something that is written or spoken

name: committee
trans: n. 委员会

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

name: constituent
trans: n. 成分；选民；委托人 adj. 构成的；选举的；有任命（或选举）权的；立宪的；有宪法制定（或修改）权的

sentences.english: the EU and its constituent members
sentences.chinese: 欧盟及其成员国

sentences.english: He told his constituents that he would continue to represent them to the best of his ability.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉他的选民们他会继续竭尽所能代表他们。

detailed_translations.english: being one of the parts of something
someone who votes in a particular area

name: legislative
trans: adj. 立法的；有立法权的 n. 立法权；立法机构

sentences.english: The new assemblies will have no legislative power.
sentences.chinese: 新的议会将没有立法权。

sentences.english: new legislative measures to stem the flow of drugs into the US
sentences.chinese: 遏制毒品流入美国的新的立法措施

detailed_translations.english: concerned with making laws

name: Senate
trans: n. 参议院，上院；（古罗马的）元老院

name: aqueduct
trans: n. [水利] 渡槽；导水管；沟渠

sentences.chinese: ...一条古罗马时代的高架渠。

detailed_translations.english: a structure like a bridge, that carries water across a river or valley

name: artifact
trans: n. 人工制品，手工艺品；非自然存在物体（artefact 的另一种拼法）

sentences.chinese: 在错误手这强有力的人工制品有能力解开灵魂。

trans: n. 星额蜂鸟 n. (Inca) 印加人 n. (Inca) （美）印加（人名）

sentences.english: With this big stick, Inca kings began eyeing the lands and resources of others.
sentences.chinese: 有了这根军事大棒，印加帝王开始觊觎别人的土地和资源。

sentences.english: But within a hundred years after the Inca began building this impressive city, they started to abandon it.
sentences.chinese: 但在开始建设这个城市之后一百年，他们又放弃了这个令人印象深刻的印加城市。

sentences.english: He believed the Inca dynasty had far deeper roots, and Maukallacta seemed the logical place to look for them.
sentences.chinese: 他认为印加王朝有着更渊源的根，要找出来，毛卡拉塔似乎是个合理的地方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 印加人(古代秘鲁土著人)

name: observatory
trans: n. 天文台；气象台；瞭望台

sentences.english: An observatory on the back side of the Moon would be a giant leap for astronomy, but there is a for more important reason to return.
sentences.chinese: 即使仅仅在月球的背面设置一个天文台，也将为天文学带来革命性的突破，何况月球的价值远远不止这些。

sentences.english: With a full-power observatory in place, that explanation, as well as a better explanation of high-energy astrophysical phenomena throughout the universe, may be available in the years to come.
sentences.chinese: 一个满负荷运作的观测站的到位，对那些热点的解释，以及对遍及宇宙的高能天文学现象的更好的解释，将会在今年内成为可能。

name: terrace
trans: n. 平台；梯田；阳台 vt. 使成梯田，使成阶地；使有平台屋顶 vi. 成阶地；成梯田；筑成坛 adj. （女服）叠层式的 n. (Terrace)人名；(英)特勒斯

sentences.english: Both a staircase and a lift connect the two floors with an enclosed terrace on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 通过一道楼梯和一台电梯连接两层楼和封闭的屋顶平台。

sentences.english: Mirrored walls, skylights and large plated windows overlooking the garden and terrace fill this modern space with light.
sentences.chinese: 镜墙、天窗和大型的金属镀窗俯瞰花园和阳台，让这个现代空间充满光线。

detailed_translations.english: a flat outdoor area next to a building or on a roof, where you can sit outside to eat, relax etc

name: element
trans: n. 元素；要素；原理；成分；自然环境 n. (Element)人名；(德)埃勒门特；(英)埃利门特

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is a one-valence element.
sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

trans: 诺贝尔奖

trans: n. 坚持不懈；不屈不挠 n. 耐性；毅力

sentences.english: He's a clever man,but fails in perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个聪明人，但缺乏毅力。

sentences.english: Their power does not come from rank or title but from intellect and perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 他们的权力并非来自等级或头衔，而是来自他们的智慧和毅力。

name: physics
trans: n. 物理学；物理现象

sentences.chinese: …物理学定律。

detailed_translations.english: the science concerned with the study of physical objects and substances, and of natural forces such as light, heat, and movement

name: revolutionize

sentences.english: New technology is going to revolutionize everything we do.
sentences.chinese: 新科技将彻底改变我们做的每一件事。

sentences.english: His work revolutionized the treatment of this disease.
sentences.chinese: 他的研究成果给这种疾病的治疗带来了革命。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the way people do something or think about something

name: Sorbonne
trans: n. （泛指）巴黎大学；索邦神学院

sentences.english: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: if you replicate someone’s work, a scientific study etc, you do it again, or try to get the same result again

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音

sentences.chinese: 描绘狩猎场面的彩色壁毯

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of heavy cloth on which coloured threads are woven to produce a picture, pattern etc

sentences.chinese: 当地居民已草拟了一份请愿书，抗议关闭医院。

sentences.english: Villagers petitioned the local authority to provide better bus services.
sentences.chinese: 村民请愿要求地方当局提供更好的公共汽车服务。

sentences.english: Like Tony Montana on his toes. Up up and down your spinning round and round.

name: barter
trans: vi. 进行易货贸易；[贸易] 作物物交换；讨价还价 vt. 以…作为交换；拿…进行易货贸易 n. 易货贸易；物物交换；实物交易 n. (Barter)人名；(英)巴特

sentences.chinese: 他们一直在用小麦交换棉花和木材。

detailed_translations.english: to exchange goods, work, or services for other goods or services rather than for money

detailed_translations.chinese: 易货贸易；物物交换；实物交易
detailed_translations.english: a system of exchanging goods and services for other goods and services rather than using money

name: circulation
trans: n. 流通，传播；循环；发行量；（图书的）借出

sentences.chinese: 运动能促进血液循环。

sentences.english: The Treasury Department plans to remove older coins from circulation and replace them with new ones.
sentences.chinese: 财政部打算收回市面上流通的旧版硬币，以新版取代。

detailed_translations.chinese: 血液循环；（资料、货币等）流通
detailed_translations.english: the movement of blood around your body

name: counterfeit
trans: adj. （钱币或商品）伪造的，假冒的；（古旧用法）假装的，虚假的 v. 伪造，仿造，造假；假装；（文）酷似 n. 仿冒品，伪造物，赝品

sentences.english: They admitted counterfeiting documents.
sentences.chinese: 他们承认伪造了文件。

sentences.english: Levi Strauss says counterfeits of the company's jeans are flooding Europe.
sentences.chinese: 利瓦伊·斯特劳斯说该公司牛仔裤的仿冒品充斥着欧洲市场。

detailed_translations.english: to copy something exactly in order to deceive people
Counterfeit is also a noun
made to look exactly like something else, in order to deceive people

name: currency
trans: n. 货币；通货

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

name: denomination
trans: n. 面额；名称；教派

sentences.english: Christians of all denominations
sentences.chinese: 各教派的基督徒

detailed_translations.english: a religious group that has different beliefs from other groups within the same religion

name: mint
trans: n. 薄荷；[金融] 造币厂，巨款 vt. 铸造，铸币 adj. 完美的 n. (Mint)人名；(毛里塔)明特

sentences.english: new potatoes sprinkled with chopped mint
sentences.chinese: 撒上薄荷屑的嫩马铃薯

sentences.english: roast lamb with mint sauce
sentences.chinese: 配薄荷调味汁的烤羔羊肉

sentences.english: Decorate with a sprig of mint .
sentences.chinese: 用小薄荷枝装饰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄荷；[金融] 造币厂，巨款
detailed_translations.english: a small plant with green leaves that have a fresh smell and taste and are used in cooking
to make a coin
looking new and in perfect condition

name: disheveled
trans: adj. 不整洁的；凌乱的 v. 使（头发等）蓬松（dishevel的过去分词）

sentences.chinese: 图书馆的桌子上摆着一堆凌乱不整的书。

sentences.chinese: 头发凌乱得像吹乱的枯草，眼睛布满血丝，颓然地趿拉着拖鞋。

sentences.chinese: 在现实中，尽管盖茨的头发总是乱糟糟的，又长着张娃娃脸，不修边幅，他可是个老练的生意人，每走一步都成竹在胸。

name: sodden
trans: adj. 浸透的；浑身湿透的；浸过酒的 vt. 使浸透；使迷糊

sentences.english: sodden clothes
sentences.chinese: 湿漉漉的衣服

sentences.english: The earth was sodden.
sentences.chinese: 土地湿透了。

detailed_translations.english: very wet and heavy

name: tragic
trans: adj. 悲剧的；悲痛的，不幸的

sentences.english: The parents were not to blame for the tragic death of their son.
sentences.chinese: 儿子的惨死不是他父母的错。

sentences.english: a great tragic actor
sentences.chinese: 一名伟大的悲剧演员

detailed_translations.english: making you feel very sad, usually because sb has died or suffered a lot

name: transfixed
trans: v. （使）惊呆；刺穿（transfix 的过去式及过去分词） adj. （因吃惊、害怕、入迷等而）不能动弹的，惊呆的

name: twitch
trans: v. 抽搐；猛拉；扯绳勒（马） n. 抽搐；晃动；急拉；（一阵）感觉；马勒

sentences.english: a nervous twitch
sentences.chinese: 神经性抽搐

detailed_translations.english: a quick movement of a muscle, especially one that you cannot control
if a part of someone’s body twitches, or if they twitch it, it makes a small sudden movement

name: capsize
trans: vt. 倾覆（特指船）；翻覆；弄翻 vi. 翻；倾覆；翻覆

sentences.english: The sea got very rough and the boat capsized.
sentences.chinese: 海的风浪变得很大，船翻了。

detailed_translations.english: if a boat capsizes, or if you capsize it, it turns over in the water

name: investigator
trans: n. 研究者；调查者；侦查员

sentences.english: police investigators
sentences.chinese: 警探

detailed_translations.english: someone who investigates things, especially crimes

name: maritime
trans: adj. 海运的，航海的，海事的；近海的，沿海的

sentences.english: San Francisco has lost nearly all of its maritime industry.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山几乎失去了所有海运业。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海的；海事的；沿海的；海员的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea or ships

name: salvage
